item.description: This is an Iranian movie depicting a group of homeless people living on an abandoned oil tanker. This is the second movie by director Mohammad Rasoulof. After the movie, look for me, I will be carrying a sign reading "Meet-Up" and we will walk to a Middle Eastern cafe on Huntington Ave (across from Northeastern)-about a 10 minute walk. The movie starts at 2:15. General Admission is $9.
item.name: Iron Island
